text: Alamgir Hashmi (also Aurangzeb Alamgir Hashmi; born 15 November 1951) is a significant Pakistani poet who writes in English. A Companion to Twentieth Century Poetry by Neil Roberts (Blackwell, 2003) His poems have received critical acclaim.Spatial Constructs in Alamgir Hashmi's Poetry by Amra Raza (Lambert Academic Publishing, 2011) ==References== Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:Pakistani poets
title: Alamgir Hashmi
